prompt_init: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
You are certainly no friend of mine. You have accused me of lying about what you had said, and run away when I proved by actual quotation that the accusation was false. We both know that, even though you praise humility, you are not humble enough to apologize.

 You sneered at my combat experience, saying "A lot of so called "combat veterans" of Vietnam smelled more perfume from call girls than they smelled cordite" and "So when you were an Army officer in Vietnam (even though you spent your time inside of Danang airbase, with at least two battalions of infantry marines on the wire ) what was the combat load for M-16 ammo per soldier on a daily patrol?" An actual friend would not have written such things.

No, you are no friend of mine, you ignorant, arrogant, hypocritical blow-hard. You should be able to guess that I do not feel friendly towards you
stories:
I don't consider you a friend in any way. You falsely accused me of lying about our conversation, and then retreated when I provided evidence to the contrary. It's clear that despite your professed admiration for humility, you lack the humility to apologize for your mistake.

Your condescending remarks about my military service are a prime example of your true nature. You made flippant comments about Vietnam veterans and questioned my experience, implying that I didn't see real combat. A genuine friend would never make such hurtful and dismissive statements.

In reality, you're not a friend to me at all. You're an arrogant, self-righteous, and hypocritical individual, and it's obvious that I don't harbor any positive feelings towards you.

I do not regard you as a friend in the slightest. You wrongly accused me of deceiving about our conversation, only to back down when I presented proof to contradict your claim. It's apparent that, despite your claimed respect for humility, you are incapable of owning up to your error.

Your patronizing comments about my military background are a perfect illustration of your true character. You made light of Vietnam veterans' experiences and doubted my service, insinuating that I wasn't involved in real combat. A true friend would never make such hurtful and disdainful remarks.

In truth, you are not a friend to me at all. Rather, you are an arrogant, self-righteous, and hypocritical person, and it's clear that I hold no affection for you.
